jewelry.name: Ear Lobe Cuff Earrings
jewelry.desc: Handcrafted in 14-karat solid gold, the Ear Lobe Cuff Earrings are sleek, edgy, and straightforward in design.

jewelry.name: Hear Locket Necklace
jewelry.desc: Beautifully handcrafted in 14-karat solid gold, this charming heart-shaped locket is a sweet addition to your chains.

jewelry.name: Bubble Barely There Bracelet
jewelry.desc: Barely There Bracelet – This 14-karat yellow gold Barely There link bracelet is a classic minimal chain for the perfect understated look.

jewelry.name: Bold Round Diamond Link Ring
jewelry.desc: 14-karat gold Bold Round Diamond Link Ring with striking chunky chain design encrusted with pavé round cut natural diamonds.

jewelry.name: Classic Cross Pendant
jewelry.desc: This classic staple is the perfect piece to add detail to your outfit. The sharp design lends an eye-catching interest to a sentimental pendant.

jewelry.name: Cushion Signet Ring with Black Onyx
jewelry.desc: Embody a modern masculinity with this bold cushion signet ring. The focal point of the ring is the handsomely polished onyx stone which sits at the center of its high-polished finish band.

jewelry.name: Dua Asymmetric Anklet
jewelry.desc: An upgrade to your sneaker and sandal game — add a little sparkle to your ankle with this stunning 14-karat yellow gold asymmetric anklet with half round and half elongated links.

jewelry.name: Bar Bracelet
jewelry.desc: Contemporary and timeless, this smooth and polished bar on a dainty bracelet chain is crafted with 14-karat solid gold and offers a lifetime of daily wear.

jewelry.name: Ultra Fine Technicolor Ring
jewelry.desc: Playful yet refined, the Ultra Fine Technicolor Ring is crafted in 14-karat solid gold set with an assortment of colored semi-precious stones that add a delicate dose of rainbow sparkle.

jewelry.name: Claw Pearl Studs
jewelry.desc: Perfect for everyday wear, you can never go wrong with these 100% natural freshwater timeless beauties in three prong 14-karat solid gold setting.
